scripts.build: babel --presets react,es2015 src/source -d src/build && browserify src/build/App.js -o js/bundle.js && cleancss css/App.css -o css/bundle.css
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p deploy/js && uglifyjs js/bundle.js > deploy/js/bundle.js && cleancss css/App.css -o deploy/css/bundle.css
